'''Google Inc.''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}} and {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], earning revenue from [[AdWords|online and mobile advertising]] related to its [[Google search|Internet search]], [[Gmail|web-based e-mail]], [[Google Maps|online mapping]], [[Google Apps|office productivity]], [[Orkut|social networking]], and [[YouTube|video sharing]] as well as selling advertising-free versions of the [[Google Search Appliance|same technologies]]. Google's headquarters, the [[Googleplex]], is located in [[Mountain View, California]], and the company has 16,805 full-time employees (as of [[December 31]] [[2007]]).<ref name=q42007results>{{cite web
+
'''Google Inc.''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}} and {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], earning revenue from [[AdWords|online and mobile advertising]] related to its [[Google search|Internet search]], [[Gmail|web-based e-mail]], [[Google Maps|online mapping]], [[Google Apps|office productivity]], [[Orkut|social networking]], and [[YouTube|video sharing]] as well as selling advertising-free versions of the [[Google Search Appliance|same technologies]]. Google's headquarters, the [[Googleplex]], is located in [[Mountain View, California]], and the company has 19,156 full-time employees (as of [[March 31]] [[2008]]).<ref name="q12008results" /> It is the largest American company (by [[market capitalization]]) that is not part of the [[Dow Jones Industrial Average]] (as of [[October 31]], [[2007]]).<ref>{{cite web
